OOC: Oops! Sorry 'bout that, maybe it's because I am always thinking of Sou=
ndwave.

BIC: Squaktalk manages to avoid most of the shots with his evasive=
 air moves, but 2 of Ratchet's shots caught him, one on his underbelly, the=
 other on his tail. Of course, he only complains about his tail.

Squaktalk=
: Hey! What was that for? Not the tail! Not the tail! I need those feathers=
, even if they aren't real! Like that one time when I transform! I need the=
 tail! Come on!

Shokaract arrives at the battle. The Mob, Deemos, and hope=
fully Godfather, Jetstorm, and Sharpedge were following. Shokaract lays his=
 eyes on Hell Beats and laughs.

Shokaract: That one looks familiar, but I =
can't place my finger on it. Shoot him!

Shokaract fires his cannon at Hell=
 Beast 3 times. Kracken fires 2 missiles at Hell Beast. Horn Drill, Beholde=
r 2, and Grenade get out their machine guns and fire away, each of them fir=
ing about 19 bullets, at Hell Beast. Gigas fires a ball of electricity at H=
ell Beast. Deemos fires 3 times at Hell Beast...
  ----- Original Message -=
---- 
  From: Alloran2@... 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Monda=
y, February 19, 2001 10:31 AM
  Subject: Re: War and Peace


  OOC: You sai=
d Soundwave, Soulstice. Anyway, im leaving today to go up to 
  Stratton, V=
ermont for the week, and i doubt i'll be able to post. As usual, 
  im not =
giving my chars to anyone, so please try to wait up. 

  :::Ratchet/Sharped=
ge/Jetstorm/Godfather/Wheeljack::: 

  Ratchet: Yeah, Rhinox, im okay. I ju=
st cant move my legs, and therefore cant 
  dodge. Now you shyould get out =
of here before you get caught in the crossfire. 
  ::Ratchet all of a sudde=
n gets an idea.  He transforms to beast mode and- 
  yes! As long as he sta=
ys in beast mode he can move! The only downside is 
  that... hes an elepha=
nt:: 
  Ratchet: Uh-oh. 
  ::He gets hit by Wildrider in the side, the plac=
e where he has the most 
  armor. He now has big wound in his side. The sho=
ts from Squawktalk miss him:: 
  Ratchet: You'll pay for that! 
  ::He fire=
s 15 shots from one gun at Wildrider and 15 shots from the other at 
  Squa=
wktalk:: 
  ~~~~~ 
  ::Sharpedge, Jetstorm, and Godfather hear Shockaract a=
nd follow him:: 
  ~~~~~ 
  ::Wheeljack installs the torpedos outside of th=
e Iron Fist and takes out his 
  test drones. He starts them up and watches=
 to see what happens::
